title: When's Death Blossom Kha'Zix going to be available? :c waiting for ages...
body:
First time wanting a new skin badly and excited for it but then checks everyday until now still not available xD so much pain ahaha.

Edit: Finally it's available <3   19/03/2016

replies.body: Right... been waiting on it since Elderwood LeBlanc has been open.  Maybe there is a bug? (lol)
